resources.string: Friendly neighborhood Superman! Born on Krypton to Jor-El and Lara, Kal-El was quickly shipped off planet as his world was destroyed. Raised on Earth by Johnathan and Martha Kent. Guardian of Metropolis and the World.
After being bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker becomes the Spiderman. After a tragic accident during his childhood Peter is raised by his grandparents. He does whatever a spider can.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. Love pizza and nunchucks. Raised by a talking rat in the sewers of New York, these turtles keep NY save from the likes of Shredder.
